first-seen.description: First time the tracking code was seen.

hostname.description: Hostname where the tracking id was found (assumed safe).

last-seen.description: Last time the tracking code was seen.

tracker.description: Name of the tracker - organisation doing the tracking and/or analytics.

url.description: URL where the tracking id was found (potentially malicious).

description: Analytics and tracking ID such as used in Google Analytics or other analytic platform.
name: tracking-id
